_aChangeLog.text: Fixed extreme shiny textures that could appear on older hardware.
Fixed vertical stripes in the skybox.
Changed the vent cover from glass to metal.

_sText:
This map is a port of cs_assault from Counter-Strike 1.6.

I decompiled it fixed everything to work in source engine and recompiled it.

The textures are from Half-Life: Source and CS:S alpha and fixed by me.

CS:GO version: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=356365718

Garry's Mod: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=357662134
